original_text: Christ died and then he became alive again. That happened so that he could be the Lord of all people, those who have died and those who are still alive.
korean_text: 이를 위하여 그리스도께서 죽었다가 다시 살아나셨으니 곧 죽은 자와 산 자의 주가 되려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: and then he became alive again
so that he could be the Lord of all people
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 모든 사람의 주가 되기 위해

sentences.original_text: and those who are still alive
